Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: I need micropayments for MESH blockchain. to use directly this assetchain token for micropayments, instead of converting it to CHIPS and back.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: once you have funds, you then reserve a portion of it for a specific payee pubkey this doesnt send anything, but reserves the stated amount for paying just that one pubkey

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: once that reserve is notarized (or enough confirms) then it can be used for sending a mempool based payment. even if the chain is reorged, the mempool transaction just gets processed again, so there is assurance that a payment made, will in fact be valid

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: final piece is to release funds that are reserved for paying a specific pubkey. this has a delayed effect until notarized or enough confirms. thus mempool payment is assured as the funds for the payment are locked in the CC contract and even if the chain is reorged, the tx will still have the funds from the reserved amounts

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: in a sense it simulates account balances, even though it is fundamentally utxo based

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: so mempools will work like a per second/mil second micropayments?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: more like a couple of seconds, but yes, as soon as it arrives in the mempool (or via whatever side channel), the payment is not reversible

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: okay

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: I can also have any unallocated funds used toward payments to pubkeys payee that is not specfically reserved. this might get double spent,but for small amounts it would be convenient to not have to setup a reserve

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: for such, the normal "until its notarized it isnt permanent" rules would be in effect, but really unless you are transacting with the actual attacker, it will be valid

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so I think for most people most of the time, the unreserved locked funds can serve the purpose for quick instant payments to any destination
